div.h2: Welcome to the Rivendell Remote Learning Site

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
vertical-align: middle; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;

tr.style: border-color: #000000; border-width: 1px; background-color: #01422e; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;

div.p:
Beginning Tuesday April 28 students receiving meals will get two days of meals on Tuesday and skip Wednesday.The schedule will be Monday, Tuesday x 2, Thursday and Friday. This schedule will be in effect for the remainder of the school year.
Meals for students at SME in daycare will also be doubled on Tuesday.

Student Meals - Schools should continue with feeding students. The continued provision of these services is required under section 6(q) of Addendum 6 which speaks to the maintenance of services for economically disadvantaged populations.

Dear Rivendell Families,
This is an extraordinary time for our community. We have developed a plan to provide meals for the students of the RISD. Our schools will prepare breakfast and lunch meals daily. Both meals will be ready for pick up at each school by 10:00 am each day. Meals will be placed on a table outside the front entrance for your convenience. If you would like a meal prepared for your child, please call or email the school office and have them sign you up.

Thank you for your patience and understanding.
Celise Johnson, FSD
____________________________________________________________
Name of Student:

Please mark the days you would like meals provided for your child over the next three weeks and share with admin. assistant. If you are unable to pick-up meals at school, please provide a physical address that we can deliver to.
Rivendell School Meals letter for familes (March 16, 2020)
